title: Team skin concepts
body: What team skin concepts are there out there? I found this TSM Lulu and I really wanted to find more like it, but I couldn't find any actual art, as opposed to simple recolors. What team skins do you think would look cool?

replies.body: I'd love to see Bjergot! haha
wowwwww I wonder what the hell they could make out of that.

Shame Rumble looks the way he does, or else he could just be a guy in a massive chair specced out like a gaming rig mixed with a walker-mech. Probably would be too much potential crossover, as it is...

I'm a fan of this C9 Lucian:
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Cloud-9-Lucian-487822202

Also Samsung Twitch, Thresh and Rengar:
http://n1ps.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Samsung-White-Twitch-Thresh-RENGAR-490747564?q=sort%3Atime%20gallery%3AN1PS&qo=86
(I'd buy the fk out of that Thresh)


+ this artist has other genderbend artwork of LoL champs and other skin concepts, like Heartbeat Sona.
Lol Thresh looks like he came right out of Yu-Gi-Oh. One of the new ones or something.

http://i.imgur.com/X3eKbsd.png


i honestly think TSM lucian is better because he has wings
That lulu skin looks awesome

Oh man I love that. The Turtle! Although these days it would be Dyrus and not Lustboy >:P

C9 Rumble plz

C9 Zed
http://i1.wp.com/mobaskins.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/skin_1412021256_760px_51153_1.jpg.jpg?resize=325%2C500

C9 Rumble
http://i0.wp.com/mobaskins.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/skin_1426866234_760px_57513_1.jpg.jpg?resize=285%2C404

C9 Ezreal
http://i2.wp.com/mobaskins.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/C9-Esa1-500x240.png?resize=500%2C240
see those are just recolors of existing skins
well obviously, they're custom skins. That's what all custom skins are.
What I was looking for though was the art, not just a recolor :/
Not every custom skin is simply a recolor, though of course they make up the majority since they are a lot easier.

I'm throwing my wallet at the screen but nothing's happening. THIS LULU SKIN. I NEED IT IN MY LIFE. THE TURTLE OH MY GOD THE TURTLE!!!! THE HEADBAND THE HAIR EVERYTHING!!!!! *inhales* 
*keeps on hyperventilating*
Shouldn't she be wearing Dyrus' jacket? I remember seeing him play Lulu a lot more than Lustboy.
Yeah, thats what I was thinking, but thats just how they made it I guess. If they ended up actually making it they would have the name of whoever played her in the game at worlds
kinda love that lulu one
id insta buy that lulu
But riot only gives skins to those that win Worlds :/ and tsm may never wonnered ever {{champion:32}}

> [{quoted}](name=jama655,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ba0Qnqj4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-25T01:33:02.235+0000)
>
> But riot only gives skins to those that win Worlds :/ and tsm may never wonnered ever {{champion:32}}

MSI will be a first glance to their actual shot at this. So far they look like the best Western team and have proven capable of winning international event (IEM).
Given how every time I see Dyrus play Lulu in competitive I get a mini heart-attack, plz no, not this.

The TSM Lulu almost looks like it could be an arcade skin.
I usually don't like the team-theme skins, but the TSM Lu and C9 Luce look badass. I'd buy 'em. Nice finds guys.
